author: IISResetMe
body:
Partial fix to #8988 

<!-- Anything that looks like this is a comment and can't be seen after the Pull Request is created. -->

# PR Summary

This PR:
 - Adds support for a new `-LiteralFile` parameter in the token parsing logic for `Switch` statements
 - Adds a new `SwitchFlags.LiteralFile` member to the Ast
 - ~~Widens the SwitchClause binder cache to accomodate `LiteralFile`-specific entries~~
 - Adds a new file resolution op to `SwitchOps` that uses `GetUnresolvedPathFromPSPath()` to avoid path globbing

<!-- Summarize your PR between here and the checklist. -->

## PR Context

As discussed in #8988, switch should have a literal path option for single-file input.
Once this is in place we can change the behavior of `switch -File` to iterate over multiple files (basically a loop expression around the switch with `-File` is used, will submit in a separate PR once this is merged)
